ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Zeb server maturing?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I don t think it s a server specific thing.  It seems to be happening across all servers.  I play on Cazic Thule, Tunare, Seventh Hammer, and it s the
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I don't think it's a server specific thing.  It seems to be happening across all servers.  I play on Cazic Thule, Tunare, Seventh Hammer, and it's the same story on all servers.
 
It's kinda sad really, but maybe I'm just nostalgic for the old days.  I don't miss having to look at the book constantly while I med though.  :)
 
Then again, it does make it harder for a druid to make a living.  Now I actually have to kill things for money! :(  What's this world coming to??
 
Wulfric
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Rob LeBeau
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, April 17, 2003 10:14 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Zeb server maturing?

Great Question.

I think POP did change some things, one of which is
that people don't hang at Druid rings anymore waiting
for ports.  So here I am a level 14 warrior wanting a
port so I go to WC and kill some Dervs while waiting
for a port.  Now, I just run my tail to Freeport and
take a book.

I think this is more in line of what we are seeing, I
play on Druzzil and see the same types of scenarios.

Good Luck
